All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
An account for the Defi Client
Address
Represents a network address with a port and host.
Appointment
 
Block
The Block class is an abstract class representing a generic block in a blockchain.
BlockSignature
The BlockSignature class represents the digital signature associated with a block in a blockchain.
BlockSkeleton
The BlockSkeleton class represents a simplified version of a block containing essential information.
Client
 
ClientConnection
Attempts to establish bidirectional connections to a specified number of peers.
Config
The Config class represents a configuration utility for a distributed system.
DefiBlock
A block implemented for the Defi use case
DefiTransaction
A specific transaction made for the Defi use case
DefiTransactionValidator
An implementation of a TransactionValidator for the Defi use case
DSA
The DSA class provides utility methods for generating DSA key pairs, signing and verifying digital signatures, and handling public key operations.
Event
 
Event.Action
 
Hashing
The Hashing class provides utility methods for creating SHA-256 hashes and generating block hashes.
HCBlock
A block implemented for the Defi use case
HCClient
 
HCTransaction
 
HCTransactionValidator
 
LockManager
The LockManager class provides a mechanism for managing locks associated with different entities in the system.
MerkleTree
Represents a Merkle Tree data structure for a list of transactions.
MerkleTreeExample
 
MerkleTreeProof
Represents a Merkle Tree proof for a specific transaction.
Message
Represents a message exchanged between nodes in a network.
Message.Request
Enumeration representing different types of requests that a message can convey.
Messager
Utility class for handling messaging functionalities in a network.
MessagerPack
Container class that holds components related to messaging, facilitating communication between entities in a network
NetworkLauncher
Launches a network given specified configurations
Node
A Node represents a peer, a cooperating member within a network following this Quorum-based blockchain protocol as implemented here.
Patient
 
Prescription
 
ServerConnection
Deterministic thread which implements the node's protocol.
StateManager
The StateManager class is responsible for managing the state transitions within the system.
Transaction
The Transaction class is an abstract class representing a generic transaction in a blockchain.
TransactionValidator
The TransactionValidator class is an abstract class representing a validator for transactions throughout the blockchain and mempool.
Utils
The Utils class provides utility methods for various common operations in the blockchain application.
